source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_00<tab>You, Raubahn, and your allies have much to discuss.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_00<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのラウバーンは、軍議を始めたいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_01<tab>Having returned to Gyr Abania after a lengthy absence, the Alliance and Resistance leaders are eager to hear you recount the tale of your adventures in the Far East. And so you tell them of your many trials and tribulations, culminating with the liberation of Doma. The news has already spread throughout the Empire, doubtless leading to unrest and unease within the imperial ranks. The time to strike is now. The Alliance and Resistance will resume their campaign to retake Ala Mhigo, beginning by capturing Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_01<tab>エオルゼアへと戻った冒険者たちを待っていたのは、髑髏連隊によってクルルが拐われたという報せだった。彼女を救うためにも、アラミゴ奪還を最終目標とした作戦「ラールガーの軍星」が開始されることになった。ラールガーズリーチにいる「コンラッド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_02<tab>Preparations are underway in Rhalgr's Reach for the forthcoming operation, but Conrad would not have you assist with them. Instead, he requests that you take a moment to speak with several of the men under his command who have each suffered great personal tragedy. Perhaps a visit from the Warrior of Light will serve to raise their spirits.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_02<tab>コンラッドから、3人の人物と話すように頼まれた。ラールガーズリーチにいる「ローエンガルデ族の闘士」、「アラミゴ人部隊の士官」「汗だくの若者」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_03<tab>To your surprise, you learn that in various small ways you have touched these soldiers' lives and helped to make them the men they are today. Another reminder, if any were needed, that we can never predict the ways in which our actions will influence those around us...
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_03<tab>3人の人物と話した。「コンラッド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_04<tab>Though Conrad was aware of the part you played in shaping his soldiers' destinies, that was not his only reason for asking you to speak with them. Hailing from vastly different walks of life, each one had his own unique motive for joining the Resistance, and he has come to question his ability to represent their interests equally. But who could possibly serve in his stead? None other than Lyse Hext, Conrad believes─though it will be for her to decide whether or not to accept this burden when the time comes.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_04<tab>コンラッドから、新たな解放軍の陣容と、それに相応しい指導者についての相談を受けた。どうやらコンラッドは、リセこそが次の指導者に相応しいと考えているようだ。作戦に参加するため、ギラバニア辺境地帯のカステッルム・コルヴィにいる「コンラッド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_05<tab>You and the Resistance forces gather at the ruins of Castellum Corvi to await the signal from the Alliance. Once General Aldynn and his men lure the bulk of the garrison away from Velodyna, you are to make for the bridge and engage the remaining defenders. Yet this too is but a feint, as the success of the operation rests on the shoulders of M'naago, who will fly to the top of the castellum with the aid of her griffin, and there employ a number of modified glamour prisms to create the illusion that the massive imperial banner has been replaced by that of the Resistance. The sight of the banner should serve to sow chaos and confusion in the imperial ranks, if all goes to plan, allowing the Allied forces to rout the enemy and claim Castellum Velodyna at last...
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_05<tab>カステッルム・コルヴィにて、仲間たちと合流した。帝国軍を無事に誘い出すことができたので、アラミゴ解放軍とともに出撃した。カステッルム・ベロジナで戦おう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_06<tab>The plan is executed to perfection. When M'naago blows her horn to draw all eyes heavensward, the imperials begin to break and run, believing the day lost. Fordola, having remained at the bridge, urges her men to stand their ground, but soon retreats herself after realizing there is naught to be done. At Conrad's urging, Lyse lets her go, for while capturing the Skulls commander would represent a fine achievement, the greater goal has been accomplished: Castellum Velodyna is yours.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_06<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナで、フォルドラたちを相手に戦った。その隙にメ・ナーゴが旗を掛け替え、作戦は成功した。カステッルム・ベロジナの「リセ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_07<tab>Ala Mhigo was not built in a single day, and neither will it be liberated in one. But the fall of the castellum marks a turning point in the campaign, for the imperials have been all but driven from the Fringes.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SEQ_07<tab>リセと話した。彼女はフォルドラを逃がしたことを残念がっていたが、アラミゴ奪還に向け、小さくとも大事な一歩を踏み出したことは間違いない。この調子で進軍していこう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_001<tab>You can go ahead and tell Marshal Tarupin that Conrad's party will be arriving any moment.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_001<tab>こっちは大丈夫。
先に「ピピン少闘将」のところに向かって。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Ephemie and the others at the Rising Stones are looking after Y'shtola now. We need not fear for her safety. As for Krile, everything that can be done is being done. It falls to the rest of us to carry on the fight.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>アレンヴァルドから詳しい事情を聞いたんだけど、
ヤ・シュトラは、すでに石の家に戻り、療養中ですって……。
エフェミたちに任せておいて問題なさそうね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_010<tab>Y'shtola may be safe, but it's still anyone's guess when she'll be strong enough to return to the field.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_010<tab>ヤ・シュトラさんなら無事だよ。
戦える状況ではないが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>I know, I know. There's naught to be gained from giving in to my emotions. I need to stay calm and composed. Krile herself would say as much.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>気持ちを切り替えなければ……。
クルルさん救出のチャンスを、見逃さないためにも……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SERPENTOFFICER_000_035<tab>I swear to you, the imperials will not cross this wall again, on my honor as a man of the Twin Adder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_SERPENTOFFICER_000_035<tab>我らグリダニア領に帝国軍の侵入を許すとは、
双蛇党にとっても痛恨事と言えましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STORMOFFICER_000_040<tab>Imperial scum! We will make them pay for this!
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STORMOFFICER_000_040<tab>おのれ、帝国軍め……卑劣なことを！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_VMAHTIA_100_040<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_PIPIN_100_050<tab>...You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> ready, yes? Then I pray you inform Father.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_PIPIN_100_050<tab>クルル嬢のことは、心配だとは思うが……
関係者にドマ遠征の報告をしてもらってもいいだろうか？
すまないが、よろしく頼むよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_100_050<tab>There you are─and there is Commander Kemp, I see. I know you are eager to speak of our next move, but we would first hear more of your last. Tell us of your deeds in Doma.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_100_050<tab>間もなく、アラミゴ解放軍の面々が到着する予定だ。
関係者がそろい次第、軍議を始めるとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_050<tab>The success of this operation is paramount. So long as the Empire holds Castellum Velodyna, the main host cannot advance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_050<tab>「ラールガーの軍星」の第一段階は、ギラバニア辺境地帯の中央、
ベロジナ大橋に築かれた「カステッルム・ベロジナ」の攻略だ。
我らがアラミゴを目指すための、最初の障害だからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_051<tab>Zenos knows this, which is why he has ordered Fordola and her men to see to the bridge's defense.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_051<tab>当然、帝国軍も、その戦略的重要性を理解しているだろう。
斥候部隊からの報告によれば、あの悪名高い「髑髏連隊」を、
橋へと送り込み、防衛力を強化しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_052<tab>So we'll get to fight the Skulls again...
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_052<tab>フォルドラたちの部隊ね……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_053<tab>The Butcher is not to be underestimated. She is decisive, ruthless, and feared by foes and friends alike. But we have a plan to defeat her.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_053<tab>うむ、今やヤツは、苛烈な戦いぶりから「髑髏の処刑人」と呼ばれ、
怖れられる存在……その守りを突破せねばならんということだ。
そこで吾輩は、次のような作戦を考案した。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_054<tab>First, we send an Alliance force down the main road, signaling our intention to mount an all-out assault. The garrison will muster their forces and prepare for a protracted battle...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_054<tab>まず、エオルゼア同盟軍の戦力で、大橋への一次攻撃を行う。
本格的な攻勢とみれば、帝国軍は当然、守勢に入るはずだ。
そして、防備を固められれば、打ち破ることは難しい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_055<tab>However, they will soon find that we are ill prepared for their counterattack. Our men will begin to break ranks and flee.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_055<tab>ここからが腕の……いや、演技力の見せ所だ。
同盟軍に所属する四都市の部隊が、散発的に攻撃を行い、
連携を欠いた様子で、やがて散り散りに撤退を始める……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_056<tab>I see... Show them your backs and give them a target too tempting not to pursue.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_056<tab>なるほど……同盟軍は「烏合の衆」であると、
そう思い込ませるわけですな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_057<tab>Aye, Fordola is too aggressive not to press the advantage. She will order her men to give chase.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_057<tab>ああ、我々が統率を欠き、総崩れとなって逃げ出し始めれば、
敵としては、追い打ちをかけたくなるはずだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_058<tab>We lure them as far as East End, where the commanders will rally their forces and attempt to hold their ground. If all goes to plan, we should be able to keep the greater part of their garrison occupied.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_058<tab>そうして、追撃に出てきた帝国の防衛部隊を、
イーストエンド混交林に誘い込み、そこで反転攻勢をかける。
このようにして、同盟軍が敵主力を引き付けている間に……

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_059<tab>...Leaving us to tackle the bridge's remaining defenders. Very clever, I'm sure. But what are we to do if the imperials smell a rat and return before we've taken the place?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_059<tab>手薄になったベロジナ大橋を、
ワシらアラミゴ解放軍の部隊が攻めると……！
とはいえ、敵も全戦力を追撃に出しはしないでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_060<tab>I don't need you to take Velodyna, Commander Kemp. All I need is for you to fly your flag from its tower.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_060<tab>むろん、そうだろう。
そこでアラミゴ解放軍には、完全な占拠を目指すのではなく、
橋に掲げられた帝国軍の軍旗を、掛け替えてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>You mean to trick them into believing that the bridge has fallen!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>そうか……！
監視塔の頂点に掲げられた軍旗は、遠方からでもよく見える。
これが、アラミゴ解放軍の軍旗に変われば……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_062<tab>Aye. We convince them Velodyna is lost, hit them hard with our reinforcements, and watch them go running for the hills.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_062<tab>我らを追撃に出ていた敵主力は、
「カステッルム・ベロジナ」が陥落したと思い込むだろう。
その動揺を見逃さず、伏兵を投じ、完全な連携攻撃をかける！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_063<tab>Then, when the dust has settled, we regroup at the castellum. What say you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_RAUBAHN_000_063<tab>そして、敵主力を打ち破った勢いそのままに、大橋攻めに合流する。
アラミゴ解放軍の方々には、それまでの間に少数の戦力で、
戦線を支えてもらうことになるが……いかがか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_064<tab>It's a bold plan...but a good one. We'll do it.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_064<tab>なんとかやってみましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>In that case, we shall support both the Resistance and the Alliance forces.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>それでは、我々「暁」も二手に別れて、
同盟軍と解放軍、それぞれに協力させていただきます。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_066<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Lyse, Arenvald─I ask that you accompany Commander Kemp. Alisaie and I will remain with the Flame General.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALPHINAUD_000_066<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、
君はリセやアレンヴァルドたちと、解放軍の支援を頼む。
同盟軍部隊には、私とアリゼーが同行しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_067<tab>We will return to Rhalgr's Reach and make our preparations. As soon as they are complete, we will join you in the field. Godsspeed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_067<tab>では、我らは一度、「ラールガーズリーチ」に戻り、
出撃準備を整えた後、潜伏地点へと向かうとしようかの。
よろしく頼みますぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_210<tab>Conrad wasn't kidding when he said they'd made a lot of progress while we were away...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_210<tab>ゼノスの襲撃から、施設の復旧は進んでいるみたいね。
あのときの雪辱戦だと思って、作戦では頑張るよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_211<tab>I can't tell you how long I've been waiting for this! It's going to be grand!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_211<tab>みんな、アラミゴの解放を信じて、
もう一度、立ち上がってくれたんです！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_212<tab>If it takes a hundred battles like this to rescue Krile, then I'll fight in every one!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_212<tab>クルルさんの救出のためにも、
この一戦、絶対に負けられないな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_220<tab>In case you haven't noticed, the flag flying above Velodyna is bloody massive. It'd take a dozen men to change it, and far too long besides. But there's no need for all that─right, M'naago?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_220<tab>さて、すぐにでも準備に取りかからねば……。
まずはベロジナ大橋にかけられた帝国の軍旗を、
掛け替える役目だが……メ・ナーゴ、頼めるな？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_221<tab>Not so long as I have my griffin and a satchel of glamour prisms, no!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_221<tab>はいッ！
グリフィンなら、あの高い鉄塔にも登れるはずです。
マジックプリズムを使えば、軍旗を一気に掛け替えることも！

source:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_224<tab>Arenvald, you're in charge of the runners between us and the Alliance. No linkpearls.
Lyse, I want you to look in on the squadrons─make sure they've got everything they need. Everybody clear?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_224<tab>うむ、メ・ナーゴは、すぐにグリフィンの支度を……。
アレンヴァルドは、同盟軍との連絡手段の再確認、
リセは、部隊の出撃準備を……頼めるかの？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_225<tab>(-All-)Aye, sir!
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_225<tab>(-リセたち-)了解！

source:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_226<tab>All forces are to depart for Castellum Corvi when ready. That will be all.
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, stay with me a moment, if you would.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_226<tab>それでは、準備を整え次第、
潜伏地点であるカステッルム・コルヴィに集合じゃ！
ああ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿は、少し残っておくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_227<tab>There's a few men I'd like you to look in on personally. Each of them has lost people, and I can tell that it weighs on their hearts...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_227<tab>お主には、このメモに記された3人に会ってもらいたいのじゃ。
仲間が拐われ、落ち着かぬところだろうが、
解放軍の今後に関わることゆえ、どうか頼むぞい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_228<tab>There have been a lot of new faces since last you were here, so it's best if I just tell you where to look. One's an officer you'll find in the Barber, another's an older fellow who likes to pass the time on the shore of Starfall. The last is a fiery young lad from Little Ala Mhigo, who I'm told trains by himself by the river to the Fringes. You'll know them when you see them. Come and find me when you've finished.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_228<tab>ワシは、ここで待っておるゆえ、
終わったら声をかけてくれんか？
手数をかけて、すまぬな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_229<tab>I have a few things to see to here, so I should still be around when you've had a word with those three men I mentioned.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_229<tab>例の3人には会ってきたかの？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALAMHIGAN02528_000_230<tab>Wait, I know you! <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93501 (( of the Maelstrom)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 (( of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var>)) /var>! It is an honor to meet you!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALAMHIGAN02528_000_230<tab>ムッ……貴方は<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var>！
エオルゼア同盟軍きっての猛将とお会いできて光栄です！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALAMHIGAN02528_000_231<tab>I was living hand-to-mouth in Ul'dah, but decided to enlist in the Flames after I heard tales of your derring-do. And now, as fate would have it, I've been sent here to join in the fight for my homeland's liberation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALAMHIGAN02528_000_231<tab>自分は、ウルダハの流民街で暮らしていたのですが、
貴方の活躍を聞いて、不滅隊に志願しましてね。
今では解放軍の支援任務に就いているのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALAMHIGAN02528_000_232<tab>Ah, but this is no time to talk. I've got to prepare for the operation! Take care, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>! We'll give those imperial whoresons what for!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALAMHIGAN02528_000_232<tab>大きな作戦が始まると聞きましたが、望むところ……！
おっと、そろそろ任務の時間……この辺りで失礼しますね！
クリスタルの導きがあらんことを！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_240<tab>I say, if it isn't the <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> who helped me find the Ward I misplaced!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_240<tab>あ、あんたは……
以前に俺の神符を見つけてくれた人じゃないか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_241<tab>Ah, but there I go again treating you as an equal! It wasn't till after you'd gone that one of my comrades pulled me aside and told me it was only the bleedin' hero of Eorzea who'd taken time out of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> busy day to help me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_241<tab>あのときは、すまなかったな。
あんたが噂の英雄とは知らずに、
くだらないことを手伝わせちまった！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_242<tab>Well, what is done is done. But know that I will fight with every onze of my strength in this coming battle, and the next and the next! Mayhap that will serve to repay the favor. Fare you well!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_242<tab>でもよ、見つけてくれた神符のご利益か、
あの後の戦いでも、どうにか生き延びてこれたんだ。
祖国奪還の日まで、俺は頑張るぜ！　それじゃあな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_250<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, am I right? I doubt you remember me, but I'll never forget you─saved my life in Little Ala Mhigo, you did.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_250<tab>おいおい、もしかして<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんか？
俺のことなんて、覚えていないと思うんだが、
一度、命を救われたことがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_251<tab>Wilred and the rest of us had got it into our heads that if we had enough crystals, we could summon Rhalgr like the Amalj'aa summoned their god. Thankfully, you put a stop to it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_251<tab>俺は、リトルアラミゴの出身でな。
ウィルレッドって、ダチとツルんで馬鹿な作戦を……
アマルジャ族からクリスタルを盗もうとしたことがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_252<tab>Ever hear about what happened to Wilred? Joined the Braves when they came calling, only to turn up dead one day. Never found out how or why, but I reckon it doesn't matter. Dead's dead, after all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_252<tab>聞いたよ、ウィルレッドのことは……。
だけど、アイツも命がけでエオルゼアのためにって、
戦ったんだと思ったら、いてもたってもいられなくてよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_253<tab>But at least he died doing what he thought was right. And maybe that's the best folks like us can hope for, eh? Not that I'm in any hurry, mind!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_STRAPPINGLAD02528_000_253<tab>今じゃ、アラミゴ解放軍で下っ端をやらせてもらってるんだ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに救われた命、
ダチのためにも無駄にしないから、見ててくれよな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_260<tab>You've had a word with the men I mentioned, then?
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_260<tab>どうじゃ、3人から話は聞けたかの？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_261<tab>As I'm sure you noticed, they've another thing in common aside from tragedy: you've touched each of their lives in one way or another. But that's not the reason I wanted you to speak with them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_261<tab>あの3人に声をかけてもらったのは、
いずれも、お主に縁のある者たちだったからなのじゃが、
もうひとつだけ理由があってな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_262<tab>A man who's lived in Gyr Abania his entire life, who bore witness to the realities of the occupation for twenty unbroken years...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_262<tab>20年間、ギラバニアの地に残り続け、
戦う道を選んだ、ローエンガルデ族の闘士……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_263<tab>A man who fled Ala Mhigo in search of a new life, who swore to serve another nation, only for fate to conspire to send him back here...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_263<tab>一度は、バエサルの長城を越えて逃げながら、
グランドカンパニーに参加することを選んだ士官……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_264<tab>A youth born on foreign soil, who never knew his parents' homeland, yet nevertheless felt kinship with our cause...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_264<tab>リトルアラミゴへの脱出を選んだ両親の下、
ザナラーンの地で生まれた、アラミゴ人二世の若者……。
三者三様の出自を持つ者たちなのじゃ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_265<tab>Three men, three stories, three reasons. Yet all belong to the Resistance. In growing larger, we've grown more diverse, and while there is good in that, there's also the potential for strife and discord.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_265<tab>アラミゴ解放軍の立て直しが進んできたと説明したが、
実際には、新たな組織に生まれ変わったと言った方が、
正しいと思えるほど、様々な者が加わっておる。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_266<tab>It'd take a special sort to lead such men to Ala Mhigo, don't you think?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_266<tab>そんな解放軍をまとめる指導者として、
誰が最適だと、お主は考えるかね？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_A1_000_001<tab>Good thing they've got you.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_A1_000_001<tab>コンラッドがいるじゃないか

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_A1_000_002<tab>Someone like Lyse, you mean?
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_A1_000_002<tab>リセならやれるだろう

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_A1_000_003<tab>...Leader of the Resistance, eh? Don't I have enough titles already?
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_A1_000_003<tab>自分がやろう

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_267<tab>For now, aye, but not forever. And, to be frank, I don't always know what to say to the ones who left, not to mention the youths.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_267<tab>ふうむ、そう言ってくれるのは嬉しいが、ワシは古い人間じゃ。
ワシとて、ギラバニアに残って戦い続けた者の気持ちしか、
代弁することができぬのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_100_267<tab>Nay, the Resistance needs a leader with a wider view. Someone who's not lived their whole life in Gyr Abania; who's known death and hardship but not been ground down by them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_100_267<tab>これからの指導者は、より広い世界を見て学び、
あらゆる痛みを知ってなお、前を向ける者でなければならない。
……そう思うのじゃ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_200_267<tab>Aye. As you may have guessed, I've been thinking of asking Lyse. But it'll be her decision in the end.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_200_267<tab>……思い描く顔があるのかな？
ワシはな、密かにリセを候補と考えておるのよ。
むろん、それは彼女自身が決めねばならぬことじゃがな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_268<tab>I see we're of one mind. She'll have to make the decision for herself, of course.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_268<tab>……ワシも同感じゃ。
だが、そのためには彼女自身がそれを決めねばならん。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_100_268<tab>You've traveled with her. Been by her side when she's had to make hard choices. You've seen her at her worst and her best. If you think she's got it in her, then she does.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_100_268<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿と旅し、広い世界を見て来た彼女が、
どのように感じ、どのようにこの先を生きるのか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_200_268<tab>Look after her, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. She's our future, and my hope.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_200_268<tab>……どうか、リセを見守ってくだされ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_269<tab>Hah, now wouldn't that be a sight! The Slayer of Gods and Savior of Ishgard leading the Resistance into battle. You're not short of relevant combat experience, I'll give you that!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_269<tab>ほう、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿が自ら先頭に立つと？
確かに、実績、実力ともに、まったく問題はないが、
お主はアラミゴ一国に留まる器ではなかろうて。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_100_269<tab>Being serious, though...I've been thinking about asking Lyse to be my successor. She's young and worldly, strong and kind. A bit daft at times, but not so much that it worries me─especially given what I've seen of her since she returned.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_100_269<tab>ワシはな、密かにリセを候補と考えておるのよ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿と旅し、広い世界を見て来た彼女が、
どのように感じ、どのようにこの先を生きるのか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_200_269<tab>Look after her, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. She's our future, and my hope.
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_200_269<tab>……どうか、リセを見守ってくだされ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_275<tab>I trust I needn't say that this conversation is just between you and me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_275<tab>さて、こんな話をしたこと、
リセには内緒にしておいてくれよ？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_276<tab>Good <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((lad)) /var>. Right, then─we'd best head to Castellum Corvi. Or what remains of it, rather.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_276<tab>では、ワシらも潜伏地点に赴くとするかの。
場所は「カステッルム・コルヴィ」……
辺境地帯にある、放棄された帝国軍の補給施設じゃて。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_070<tab>I said it then, and I'll say it again: I won't let it all be for nothing...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_070<tab>東方で手にした力、受け継いだ想い、
そのすべてを、これからの戦いにぶつけるつもり。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALISAIE_000_075<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_080<tab>I'll prove to them that it wasn't a mistake...
...That I wasn't a mistake.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_080<tab>この戦いで、絶対に役に立ってみせる……。
もう誰かに庇われるのも、誰かを失うのもごめんだからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_100<tab>Her name is Obda. We've known each other since we were small. We'll be going on this mission together...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_100<tab>このグリフィンの名前は「オブダ」……。
小さい頃から、いっしょに狩りをしてきた相棒なんです。
今回の任務は、この子とやることにしました……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ANANTASOLDIER_000_105<tab>You are the warrior, yesss? It is an honor.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ANANTASOLDIER_000_105<tab>シュー……お前もアラミゴ解放軍の協力者か？
私はアナンタ族、ウィルラ派の闘士だ。
いざともに戦わん！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_170<tab>We'll lead the way while the other units launch their own separate attacks. Remember that we need to hold out until M'naago sees to the flag.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_170<tab>うむ、これで全員そろったようじゃな。
ワシら本命の突入部隊に加えて、ほかにも複数ルートから、
軍旗の掛け替えを目指せるように、配置も完了しておる。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_171<tab>Got your gear in order? Any moment now...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_171<tab>さて、そろそろ同盟軍も動き出す頃合いじゃが、
武器や防具の準備はいいだろうな？

source:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_000_175<tab>Think you're clever with all your little tricks? Think again!
None of you are leaving here alive!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_000_175<tab>本隊の撤退は、陽動ということか……！
だが、それだけの手勢で落とせると思うなよッ！
貴様たちは、この場で私が始末するッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_180<tab>Did you see that, A'aba, Aulie? We did it!
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_000_180<tab>アバ、オリ……俺は、俺はやったぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_185<tab><pant> <pant> For a moment there, I didn't think I could do it...but then I did!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MNAAGO_000_185<tab>はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……。
帝国の軍旗をマジックプリズムで書き換えるときに、
落としちゃわないかどうか心配で、緊張しましたぁ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_190<tab>Well fought, brothers and sisters! Today is a day that will be remembered for generations to come!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_000_190<tab>皆、よく戦ってくれた！
誇りに思うぞい！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ANANTASOLDIER_000_195<tab>Ssso, you are indeed everything they sssay. The ssstuff of legends...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ANANTASOLDIER_000_195<tab>シュー……お前の戦いぶり、実に見事だった。
ヒトの子とは思えないほど、素早く鋭い動き……。
感服したぞ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_200<tab>It's a shame Fordola got away, but we did what we came here to do.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_200<tab>フォルドラを逃しちゃったのは残念だけど、
それでも、アタシたち勝ったんだよね？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_201<tab>I have to remind myself it's just the first step...but it's a big one. We're going to take it back...all of it─one ilm at a time if we have to!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_000_201<tab>まだまだ小さな一歩に過ぎないけど、
この調子で、どんどん前に進んでいこう。
アラミゴを帝国の手から取り戻す、その時まで！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Head for Castellum Velodyna!
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナへ向かえ

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Defeat Fordola rem Lupis!
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>フォルドラ・レム・ルプスを倒せ

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>Quickly now! We've got to reach Velodyna before General Aldynn and his men are overwhelmed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>さあ、一気にベロジナ大橋に……
カステッルム・ベロジナに接近するのじゃ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_101_002<tab>Scouts, dead ahead! If they see us, they'll warn the others!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_101_002<tab>敵の斥候部隊！？
ここで気付かれたら、せっかくの陽動作戦が台無しだよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_101_003<tab>Not if we kill them first!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_101_003<tab>迂回している時間はない！
騒がれる前に、黙らせてしまうんだ！

target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_EMPIRE_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_101_006<tab>That's the last of 'em! Let's keep moving!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_101_006<tab>よし、斥候部隊を蹴散らしたぞ！
カステッルム・ベロジナへ急ごう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_001_007<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_001_007<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_101_007<tab>What are you doing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? Stay close!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_101_007<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、あまり離れないで！
部隊のみんなと動かないと！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_001_008<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_001_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_101_008<tab>Bah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s gone on ahead. After <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_101_008<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が、先行してしまったか……
仕方ない、俺たちも続こう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>No sign of sentries. General Aldynn must have his hands full.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>敵の防衛部隊の姿が見えん……。
どうやら同盟軍本体の陽動は、成功したようじゃな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_102_002<tab>Then let's seize the bridge and be done with it!
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_102_002<tab>今のうちに、カステッルム・ベロジナに取り付くんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_102_003<tab>They left a token force behind. Nothing we can't handle!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_102_003<tab>残留していた帝国軍の防衛部隊だな！？
こいつらさえ蹴散らせば！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_002_004<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_002_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_102_004<tab>Cannons! They could use those to fire on Naago!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_102_004<tab>見て、あの大砲を！
メ・ナーゴが塔に取り付けるように、排除しないと！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_002_005<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_002_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_102_005<tab>That's the last of the cannons! It should be safe for Naago now!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_102_005<tab>やった、大砲の破壊に成功！
これでメ・ナーゴも塔に近づけるはず！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MARMOR_BATTLETALK_002_006<tab>Fire at will! Kill every last one of the savages!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_MARMOR_BATTLETALK_002_006<tab>全砲門開け！
エオルゼアの蛮族どもを根絶やしにするのだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>You may have survived the Reach, <var 1A 02 /var>hero<var 1A 01 /var>, but this time you won't be so lucky.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>貴様は、ラールガーズリーチで戦った蛮族の英雄……
あのときは後れを取ったが、ここで始末してくれる！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>This bridge belongs to the Empire! I am not about to give it up!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>ゼノス様より頂戴したこの「ガンブレード」にかけて、
貴様を葬ってやる！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>Hero or not, you'll die just like all the rest!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>英雄と呼ばれるだけのことは、あるってことか……
だが、これならどうだ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>This is MY BRIDGE! You are NOT taking this from me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_FORDRA_BATTLETALK_007_001<tab>ここで……ここで負けるものか！
ようやく栄光をつかみかけたのだ……敗者になどなれるものかッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab>Naago made it! We've only got to hold on a little longer...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_007_002<tab>よしッ、グリフィンが塔に……！！
ナーゴォ、いっけえええッ！！！

target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ALENVALD_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>No, I can't! Not yet!
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_ARENVALD_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>しまった……油断したか……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LISE_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Damn it all...
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_LYSE_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>ごめん、やられちゃった……みたい……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Ugh... That's it for me...
target: TEXT_STMBDA602_02528_CONRAD_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>ここらが引き際か……すまぬが退かせてもらうぞい……。
